message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I think a 60-40 split, with me getting 60%, is fairer. After all, I'm taking the risk of losing money with each round.
You're losing value with each round, I think 65-35 is a good compromise.
I'm willing to go up to 70% for me, but I need a better deal than 65-35.  The inflation is really hurting me.
Inflation is indeed hurting you, so I'll take a bit more. This is my final offer.
